Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Captain.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory83.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Captain! Captain!', 4: '1'}
{3: "Kamui's pestering snaps Chrome out of his deep thoughts. The destination of this mission now lies right before Chrome's eyes."}

{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'The objective of this mission is to occupy this Corrupted spawning ground. Strike Hawk and the other teams will stay behind in Zone C to attract and contain any and all hostile entities.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: '(This other team is... actually...)', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "You've briefed me on the mission countless times, remember?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Countless times, you say?', 4: '2'}

{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'You\'ve been saying the same thing over and over since we got on the aircraft. Oh, and you also said: "If anything happens, you get out of here. I\'ll take care of the rest."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: '...I said that? Well, in that case, this command...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "I wasn't going to follow it anyway.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: '...Where are the others? Why are their signals outside this area?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'For Smith, one sidekick is enough.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Chrome realizes from this conversation that Kamui noticed his concern and figured out his plan for the day, but he doesn't know when."}

{3: "He instantly feels something—not nervousness, not animosity. Chrome can't really tell what it is. It's something he hasn't ever experienced before... something that seems to have burst his bubble."}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'What do you want?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'I just hate to see...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Kamui slowly softens his tone.'}
{3: "I mean, I'm just trying to get that frown off your face."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "That looks like it's all scrunched up with paper and wrinkles... The one you're making right now, chief. You aren't aware?", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Ah, they're on the move. I'll go take 'em down.", 4: '2'}
{3: "Before Chrome can say anything, Kamui has already rushed off towards the Corrupted. He's about to pull out his weapon when he turns around, as if suddenly reminded of something."}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Captain Smith! Well, you're not Smith yet, but I'll call you that for now anyway. Captain Smith! sit tight for my good news!", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{2: 'John', 3: "Looks like the battle's already started. Chrome, I'll arrange for the support forces to pick you up at a location nearby. Retreat immediately.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "And then I'll become Smith?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'John', 3: 'I\'ll have to climb to the position I need first. But you did carry out the responsibility of "Smith". Soon, I believe, you\'ll become Smith, like you wanted. Now, retreat.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Do I want to become Smith?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'No, Smith... No, father.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "It's not that I want to become Smith, but I NEED to...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'John', 3: "Isn't it the same thing?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "No. I've always followed your orders. The reason my goal is to become Smith is because I have no other choice.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Every action of mine is determined by your will...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'John', 3: "That is the price of your existence. What's the point of bringing it up now?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "I'm bringing it up because I want my autonomy back.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: '"Once the shell called the body is abandoned, what does the human leave behind?"', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "The part that's left behind in me is Chrome. Not Langston. And certainly not Smith!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "I'll meet up with the other squad members that departed early. After that, we'll defend the place until our very last breaths!", 4: '2'}
